Instance Property# allowFailover

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
var allowFailover: Bool { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSSettings/allowFailover#discussion)

A boolean indicating if failover to the default system resolver is permitted on resolution failure.
